definition: a monument/an upright stone tablet/stele/CL:塊|块[kuai4],面[mian4]
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
public praise/public reputation/commonly held opinions/current idiom
large inscribed stele/fig. great achievement/imperishable masterpiece
Forest of Steles (museum in Xi'an)/Beilin District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
every voice gives praise (idiom); with an extensive public reputation
Beilin District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi
Gaobeidian county level city in Baoding 保定[Bao3 ding4], Hebei
a rubbing from a stone inscription

sentences.english: Only such a monument can match the spirit of the Red Flag Canal displayed by Linzhou people.
sentences.chinese: 只有这样的碑才配得上林州人创造的红旗渠精神。

sentences.english: As the original trail has not existed for a long time, the researchers mostly use the tablet rubbings as their basis.
sentences.chinese: 碑之原迹早已不存，研究者大多是以拓本摩本为据。
这个錾字碑上写了什么样的内容？

sentences.english: Look at this stele describing the Daqin Jingjiao religion in China.
sentences.chinese: 你瞧，大秦景教流行中国碑。

sentences.english: I remember carved inscription, 'inscribed' rush-chuen dream '.
sentences.chinese: 我记得碑上刻的是‘梦赶泉’。

sentences.english: The Primogenitor of Khitan, Jishou, whose story came down from generation to generation in Khitans, is a character who actually existed in history.
sentences.chinese: 契丹人口碑相传的始祖奇首是一个真实的历史人物。
这座碑是为纪念我们的胜利而建的。

sentences.english: The monument was dedicated to the memory of the national hero.
sentences.chinese: 这座碑是为纪念那位民族英雄而建造的。

sentences.english: They will put up a monument in the middle of the park.
sentences.chinese: 他们将在公园大旨营建一座庆贺碑。

sentences.english: It is after all a very old stele.
sentences.chinese: 这可是一块很古老的碑。

sentences.english: So the emperor mausoleum monument more than a pack of turtles, it is as Anyu basalt.
sentences.chinese: 所以帝王陵寝多有驮碑之龟，正是以此暗寓玄武。

sentences.english: They are divine decisions written on the tablet of destinies.
sentences.chinese: 它们是神的决定，就写在命运碑匾上。

sentences.english: On the tablet are inscribed the names of the donators.
sentences.chinese: 碑上刻着捐款者的名字。

sentences.english: The monument was erected in his honour.
sentences.chinese: 这座碑是为纪念他而建的。

sentences.english: Yang Fu was a noted Bai scholar of Dali, who once wrote Shanhua Stele in Bai language.
sentences.chinese: 杨黼是大理著名的白族学者，著有白文《山花碑》。

sentences.english: The Sino-Burma Friendship Monument is a boundary sign and a friendship symbol.
sentences.chinese: 中缅友谊碑既是国门的标志，又是友谊的象征。

definition: stele/vertical stone tablet for carved inscriptions
a record of events inscribed on a tablet
the top part of a tablet
pedestal in the form of a tortoise
